steps.1: Slice-Slice one tomato into about 1/2 inch thick slices
steps.2: Place-Place the thick slices of tomatoes on a platter, ensuring they only make a single layer
steps.3: Add-Add a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, about 1 tablespoon, over the entire platter
steps.4: dry-gently dry it with a tea towel
steps.5: Season-Season the tomato slices with salt
steps.6: Sprinkle-Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top of the tomato throughout the platter
steps.8: Season-Season platter with 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
